PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2005-01722005-02-10,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of DAVID BARNARD of Regina, Saskatchewan, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada to hold office, during good behaviour, for a term ending February 28, 2007, in the place of Harold Hugh MacKay, who has resigned.
AttachmentsAttachment
